name: Shotgun Honeymoon
description:
A game about a lunatic and his love.

WASD to move, Mouse to aim and shoot, F to speak to your gun.
Collect exp to earn perks.

Created in a month for Game Off 2022

Theme: Cliche (Shotgun Wedding, as well as the perk names)

Creators:

Baylee Munson
Benson Zhang
Edyn Dening
Joshua White
Tom Mehan


Known issue: Make sure you level up before you reach the second level, or you will never be able to do so again!

Also, the level generation sometimes fails. Sorry!
